title: Can i gift RP If I'M suspended?
body: So I'm suspended for 14 days, and I tried to buy RP for my friend but she didn't receive it. I don't know what's going on. She's not suspended, but I am. The gifting action succeeded but she did not receive the RP.

replies.body: Depending on the suspension type, a player may have access to chat or the store but unable to play matches.  If you have any concerns about a purchase made, feel free to reach out to us in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can review the transaction and confirm if it's been received.  You can also wait for your friend for the nice surprise!
